summary.span: 指定 控件列的外观、文本格式和行为。

span.span: Specifies the appearance, text formatting, and behavior of a control column.

summary.span: 此类为抽象类。

span.span: This class is abstract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合对象 ( ) 通过访问控件的属性。The collection of objects (the ) is accessed through the control's property. 控件自动创建的集合对象为你设置时到适当的数据源的属性。The control automatically creates a collection of objects for you when you set the property to an appropriate data source. 创建的对象实际上是继承自的以下类之一的实例:或类。The objects created actually are instances of one of the following classes that inherit from : or class. 若要设置格式的数据显示，请设置属性为格式设置的值之一的类。To format the data display, set the property of the class to one of the formatting values. 有关有效格式设置的值的详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)和[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information about valid formatting values, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 你还可以创建自己的集对象，并将其添加到。You can also create your own set of objects and add them to the . 执行此操作时，必须设置到每个列样式的的与实际的数据同步显示列的显示。When you do so, you must set the of each column style to the of a to synchronize the display of columns with the actual data. > [!CAUTION] > 始终创建对象，并将其添加到之前添加对象添加到。Always create objects and add them to the before adding objects to the . 当你将添加一个空使用一个有效到集合中，值自动为你生成的对象。When you add an empty with a valid value to the collection, objects are automatically generated for you. 如果你尝试添加新因此，将引发异常对象具有重复值复制到。Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new objects with duplicate values to the . 当派生类之一通过实例化控件，创建的类取决于的与关联对象。When one of the derived classes is instantiated by a control, the class created depends on the of the associated with the object. 例如，与其设置为`System.Boolean`将与关联。For example, a with its set to `System.Boolean` will be associated with a . 若要确定的任何类型，使用方法。To determine the type of any , use the method. 若要创建您自己的列类，可以继承自。To create your own column classes, you can inherit from . 你可能想要这样做以便在创建主机控件的特殊列，即为例证类，哪些主机控件。You might want to do this in order to create special columns that host controls, as exemplified by the class, which hosts the control. 例如，可以承载控件以显示在列中，图片或在列中，可以创建您自己的用户控件到主机。For example, you can host an control to show pictures in columns, or you can create your own user control to host in the column. 功能不应将其与的混淆。The functionality of the shouldn't be confused with that of the . 而包含的属性和方法适用于创建数据表的架构，包含的属性和方法与在屏幕上的单个列的外观。Whereas the contains the properties and methods appropriate to creating a data table's schema, the contains the properties and methods related to the appearance of an individual column on the screen. 如果某一行包含，列中显示的文本可以设置与属性。If a row contains a , the text displayed in the column can be set with the property. 类还允许你指定的列的行为，同时正在改变其数据。The class also allows you to specify the behavior of a column while its data is being changed. 和方法暂时挂起列的绘制到列的数据进行大规模更新时。The and methods temporarily suspend the drawing of the column while large updates are being made to the column's data. 如果没有此功能，每个单元格的网格中的每个更改将立即绘制;这可能是让人分散注意力向用户和性能责任。Without this functionality, every change in every cell of the grid would be immediately drawn; this could be distracting to the user and a performance liability. 有多种方法允许用户编辑列的监视包括和事件。Several methods allow monitoring of the column as it is edited by the user, including the and events. 大部分属性和类的方法适用于控制列的外观。Most of the properties and methods of the class are tailored to controlling a column's appearance. 但几个，如一样和可用于检查和更改中指定的单元格的值。But a few, such as the and allow you to examine and change the value in a specified cell. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建承载控件。The following code example creates a that hosts a control. [!code-cpp[DataGridColumnStyle Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridColumnStyle Overview/CPP/timecolumn.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataGridColumnStyle Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridColumnStyle Overview/CS/timecolumn.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataGridColumnStyle Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridColumnStyle Overview/VB/timecolumn.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在派生类中被重写时，将启动一个请求来中断编辑过程。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, initiates a request to interrupt an edit procedure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由时方法方法返回`false`。The method is used by the when the method of the method returns `false`. 在这种情况下，列值将回滚到以前的值。In that case, the column value is rolled back to its previous value. 在返回之前必须结束所有编辑操作。The must end any editing operations before returning. 使用方法来实现此目的。Use the method to accomplish this. 方法控件间接调用如果其`ShouldAbort`参数设置为`true`。The method of the control indirectly invokes if its `ShouldAbort` parameter is set to `true`.

summary.span: 一直挂起列的绘制，直到调用 方法为止。

span.span: Suspends the painting of the column until the method is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当的外观进行了大量更改控件 （是否正在更改列或由控件显示的数据的特性），应调用方法来暂时冻结控件的绘制。When many changes are made to the appearance of a control (whether the changes are in the attributes of the column or the data displayed by the control), you should invoke the method to temporarily freeze the drawing of the control. 这会导致更少受干扰到用户，并且提高性能。This results in less distraction to the user, and a performance gain. 所有更新之后，调用方法来恢复的控件的绘制。After all updates have been made, invoke the method to resume drawing of the control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示可能重写方法。The following code example shows a possible override of the method. 该代码时，将调用方法，，然后选择允许其他函数来确定列是否仍在的变量更编辑的设置。The code invokes the method, and then sets a variable that allows other functions to determine whether the column is still in edit more. 然后，代码调用方法进行重绘控件。The code then calls the method to redraw the control. 最后，该函数返回`true`以指示已提交更改。Finally, the function returns `true` to indicate the change has been committed. [!code-vb[Classic DataGridColumnStyle.Commit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridColumnStyle.Commit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.para: 方法应由派生自的类类中重置其编辑状态，例如，可以放弃焦点，如果承载的编辑控件。请参阅方法。调用方法时接收完成编辑的请求。如果这是不可能没有错误，则返回。的公共方法的调用方法的控件。该方法也称为其他私有方法，例如，更改当前行时。

The method should be used by classes derived from the class to reset their editing state, for example, to concede the focus if the hosts an editing control. See the method. Call the method when the receives a request to complete editing. If this is not possible without error, return . The method is called by the public method of the control. The method is also called by other private methods, for example, when the current row is changed.

summary.span: 继续绘制由调用 方法而挂起的列。

span.span: Resumes the painting of columns suspended by calling the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当的外观进行了大量更改控件 （是否正在更改列或由控件显示的数据的特性），应调用方法来暂时冻结控件的绘制。When many changes are made to the appearance of a control (whether the changes are in the attributes of the column or the data displayed by the control), you should invoke the method to temporarily freeze the drawing of the control. 这会导致更少受干扰到用户，并且提高性能。This results in less distraction to the user, and a performance gain. 所有更新之后，调用方法来恢复的控件的绘制。After all updates have been made, invoke the method to resume drawing of the control.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示该列中的数据是否可以编辑。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the data in the column can be edited.

value.span: 如果数据不能编辑，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: , if the data cannot be edited; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使列成为只读上，如果它包含一个主键或其值自动生成 (比如对象的属性设置为`true`)。Make a column read-only if it contains a primary key or if its value is generated automatically (as when the object's property is set to `true`). 类似的只读属性存在于其他类中，每个允许更好地控制对数据的访问。Similar read-only properties exist on other classes, each allowing more control over the access to data. 例如，控件可通过使用设置为只读模式其属性;还有属性，与类具有限制数据更新的属性。For example, the control can be set to read-only mode by using its property; the also has a property, and the class has a property for restricting data updates. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置对象的到相同的值的属性对象的属性。The following code example sets the object's property to the same value as the object's property. [!code-cpp[Classic DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 不再需要列所承载的控件时，允许列释放资源。

span.span: Allows the column to free resources when the control it hosts is not needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你创建一个派生自的类，你通常将使用派生的类来承载控件用于编辑数据。If you create a class that derives from , you will often use the derived class to host a control that is used to edit data. 应重写方法来释放对该控件的任何引用，以释放系统资源。You should override the method to release any references to the control in order to free system resources. 例如，派生的类使用此方法来释放所承载的引用。For example, the derived class uses this method to release the reference to the hosted .
